page.title: 13CRICKET CLUBS
page.content: CLOUGHCOR BOASTS THREE CRICKET CLUBS- BURNDENNETT,THORNHILL(AT MILLTOWN) AND FOX LODGE(AT BALLYMAGORRY).FOR ME THE MOST IMPORTANT IS BURNDENNETT SINCE I AM A MEMBER.I WILL DESCRIBE IT FOR YOU NOW.FIVE ACRES IN AREA IT IS BOUNDED BY A FENCE AT ONE END AND HEDGES AT THE OTHER THREE.THERE IS A LARGE CLUB HOUSE WITH CHANGING ROOMS,WASHING-UP FACILITIES,KITCHEN AND CAFETERIA.TOOLS AND EQUIPMENT FOR ATTENDING TO THE PITCH ARE STORED IN THE CARETAKER'S HUT.THERE ARE FOUR DIFFERENT TEAMS CATERING FOR ALL AGE GROUPS. THERE IS ALSO A TEAM FOR LADIES. MOST OF THE BETTER-KNOWN NORTHERN IRELAND TEAMS PLAY HERE IN LEAGUE AND CHAMPIONSHIP MATCHES.A"SPORTS FOR ALL DAY"IS RUN EACH YEAR AND IS THE HIGHLIGHT OF OUR ANNUAL PROGRAMME.THE CLUBHOUSE IS THE CENTRE FOR SOCIAL FUNCTIONS IN THE AREA AND IS WELL-SUPPORTED.
